import React from "react"; import "slick-carousel/slick/slick.css"; import "slick-carousel/slick/slick-theme.css"; import Slider from "react-slick"; import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; import { Carousel, ListGroup, Nav, Navbar, Container, NavDropdown} from 'react-bootstrap'; import { BrowserRouter as Router, Routes, Route, Link} from 'react-router-dom'; import "./css/inicio.css" import "./css/comics.css" function Comics(){ function Imagenes() { let filtering = $("#Valor").val().toLowerCase(); $(".Contenedor-imagenes").hide(); $('.Contenedor-imagenes').each(function() { if ($(this).text().toLowerCase().indexOf(filtering) !== -1 || $("img", this).attr("alt").toLowerCase().indexOf(filtering) !== -1) { $(this).show(); } }); }; document.getElementById('Valor').onkeypress = function(e) { var event = e || window.event; var charCode = event.which || event.keyCode; if ( charCode == '13' ) { let filtering = $("#Valor").val().toLowerCase(); $(".Contenedor-imagenes").hide(); $("#Pag1").show(); $("#Pag2").show(); if ($(this).val().length === 0){ verificarContainer1() verificarContainer() } $('.Contenedor-imagenes').each(function() { if ($(this).text().toLowerCase().indexOf(filtering) !== -1 || $("img", this).attr("alt").toLowerCase().indexOf(filtering) !== -1) { $(this).show(); } }); } } const settingsComicss = { dots: true, infinite: false, speed: 500, slidesToShow: 5, slidesToScroll: 3, adaptiveHeight:true }; return(
